name: ClustExp_StatParse.py
description: Parser for statistical data sets and subject data sets, generating several outputs for further analysis.
author: AFNI Developers

inputs.name: Threshold subbrik
inputs.description: Threshold subbrik. Might be the same as MeanBrik (integer >= 0).

inputs.name: Table with subject labels and input datasets
inputs.description: Table with subject labels and input datasets.

inputs.name: Atlas name for lookup
inputs.description: Atlas name for lookup (list at: whereami -help).

inputs.name: Output parent folder
inputs.description: Output parent folder if you don't want the current working directory.

inputs.name: Remove previous folder with same PREFIX
inputs.description: Remove previous folder with same PREFIX.

output-files.name: Table with all data extracted from all subjects
output-files.description: Table with all data extracted from all subjects.

output-files.name: Table with information parsed from the statistics data set history.
output-files.description: Table with information parsed from the statistics data set history.

output-files.name: Cleaned up version of the whereami output
output-files.description: Cleaned up version of the whereami output.

output-files.name: Summary info for the shiny app
output-files.description: Summary info for the shiny app.

output-files.name: A new data set from input statistics, thresholded at uncorrected p value.
output-files.description: A new data set from input statistics, thresholded at uncorrected p value.

output-files.name: Integer labeled mask of the thresholded image with cluster sizes at least as big as the -MinVox.
output-files.description: Integer labeled mask of the thresholded image with cluster sizes at least as big as the -MinVox.

output-files.name: A NIfTI copy of the master file provided that may have been resampled
output-files.description: A NIfTI copy of the master file provided that may have been resampled.
